word:
Elder Olsen was bewildered, and knew not what to say. He had not heard of the special committee council 
                                                                           317
which had been continued into the early hours of that very morning, and which had closed less than two hours before the angel bade Mrs. White tell the vision given her four months before, in which this very meeting was minutely described. But he had not long to wait for an explanation. Soon the men who had been in the council of the night before arose and testified regarding their committee meeting.
